column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: SERIAL_NUMBER
column.comment: The serial number of the SIM - SIM card serial number from SII.

column.name: SERIAL_TYPE
column.comment: The type of the serial item.  Valid values are  E - SIM card,  H - handset,  P - package,  S - other serial,   V - voucher,  N - non serial  For phase II it will be  'E' only. - Part of PK of SIM_CARD_INVENTORY.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: ACT_ISSUE_DATE
column.comment: The date of the last update of the entry.

column.name: ITEM_ID
column.comment: The code of the item.

column.name: POOL
column.comment: The pool to which the serial item belongs, represents the usage of the serial item.

column.name: LOCATION_ID
column.comment: Identifier of the location.

column.name: DOCUMENT_LOC_ID
column.comment: The identity of the location where this movement originated.

column.name: DOCUMENT_TYPE
column.comment: The RMS activity that triggered this transaction. Valid values are  A - Adjust In  C - Physical Count (not use in DWH)  F - Transfer Out  H - Send to repair  I - Invoice/Sale  J - Return from repair  N - Change pool  O - Order  R - Receipt from Vendor  T

column.name: DOCUMENT_OID
column.comment: The OID of the Last Activity type for this transaction

column.name: ACTIVITY_CODE
column.comment: Allowed activity code

column.name: ACTIVITY_DATE
column.comment: The date of the activity.

column.name: OPERATION_STATUS
column.comment: The operating status of the Item. Valid values are  O - Operating,  D - Damaged,  R - Review.

column.name: IMSI
column.comment: This is the IMSI (i.e., the International Mobile Subscriber Identity) number of the SIM Card. The network identification of the card.

column.name: LOGO_ID
column.comment: Code used to identify the logo printed on the SIM card. Valid entries are M5 (MMO-Jaguar), MD (MMO-Jubi) etc. - Together with SIM_TYPE the FK to the TC_SIM_DEFINITION table.

column.name: ACCESS_CONTROL_CLASS
column.comment: Verschluesselung der Prioritaet, die den bestellten SIM-Karten bei Netzauslastung eingeraeumt wird. Gueltige Werte sind derzeit nur NO (normale Zugangskontrollklasse).

column.name: ITEM_OWNERSHIP
column.comment: The owner of the serial item.

column.name: ITEM_OWNERSHIP_DT
column.comment: The last date the item-ownership was updated.

column.name: CURR_POSSESSION
column.comment: This is the value of the current possessor of the serial item.

column.name: CURR_POSSESSION_DT
column.comment: The last date the current possession was updated.

column.name: MISSING_IND
column.comment: Indicates that the Item is reported as missing. Valid values are  Y  - missing and  N - not missing.

column.name: IN_REPAIR_IND
column.comment: N/A

column.name: IN_TRANSIT_IND
column.comment: N/A

column.name: COMMITTED_TO_POS_IND
column.comment: N/A

column.name: COMMITTED_DATE
column.comment: Indicates the date the serial item was committed to POS order.

column.name: PRE_PROG_SUBSC_NO
column.comment: Participant number

column.name: INV_EFF_DATE
column.comment: The date of the last activity that affects the inventory.

column.name: POS_DOCUMENT_LOCID
column.comment: The identity of the location where this movement originated.

column.name: POS_DOCUMENT_TYPE
column.comment: The RMS activity that triggered this transaction. Valid values are  A - Adjust In  C - Physical Count (not use in DWH)  F - Transfer Out  H - Send to repair  I - Invoice/Sale  J - Return from repair  N - Change pool  O - Order  R - Receipt from Vendor  T

column.name: POS_DOCUMENT_OID
column.comment: The OID of the Last Activity type for this transaction

column.name: ACTIVITY_REASON
column.comment: The reason of the activity.

column.name: SIM_STATUS
column.comment: This status of a Sim Card is automatically handled by the system processes. This status field, together with the inventory status fields that are used for every serial item unit, describes the current status and location of the SIM card. Valid values are:

column.name: LAST_COUNTED_DATE
column.comment: The last date when the item was counted during a Physical Count.

column.name: UPGRADE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the serial item was sold due to an upgrade.  Currently not in use.  The value is set by the 'invoice' activity.

column.name: EXPECTED_RTRN_DATE
column.comment: The date the serial item that belongs to the location is expected to be returned (if the serial item was rented, loaned or sent for repair).

column.name: REPAIR_LOCATION_ID
column.comment: N/A

column.name: EU_BOOK_VAL_AT_SALE
column.comment: The book value of the SI at sale date in EUR (derived from the WAC of this item).  Currently not in use

column.name: DATE_OF_SALE
column.comment: The date on which the serial item sold.

column.name: EU_INITIAL_BOOK_VAL
column.comment: The initial value of the used serial item in EUR (derived from the WAC of this item). Depreciation begins with this value.  Currently not in use  The value is set to null for a new item and set to the WAC value when the serial item changes to 'Used'.

column.name: INITIAL_DPR_DATE
column.comment: The initial date on which the serial item was set to Used.

column.name: INI_NO_MONTHS_TO_DPR
column.comment: The total number of months to depreciate this used serial item.  Currently not in use  The value is set when the serial item was changed to Used.

column.name: EU_INIT_MONTHLY_DPR
column.comment: Currently not in use

column.name: EU_ADJ_BOOK_VALUE
column.comment: Currently not in use

column.name: ADJ_NO_MNTH_TO_DPR
column.comment: Currently not in use

column.name: EU_ADJ_MONTHLY_DPR
column.comment: Currently not in use

column.name: DPR_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: The depreciation update date

column.name: LAST_DPR_DATE
column.comment: The date of the last depreciation.

column.name: EU_CURR_BOOK_VALUE
column.comment: The current used serial item book value in EUR. It is calculated as the last current book value minus this month's depreciation amount.

column.name: CUR_NO_MONTHS_TO_DPR
column.comment: The total number of months left to depreciate this used serial item.

column.name: POLICE_REPORT_NO
column.comment: The number of the police report issued for the missing serial item.

column.name: POLICE_REPORT_DATE
column.comment: The date when the police report for the missing serial item was issued.

column.name: POLICE_STATION
column.comment: The name of the police station where the report was issued.

column.name: AGENT_LOCATION
column.comment: The agent location.

column.name: NDC_CD
column.comment: National Destination Code (the area code of a phone number)

column.name: HLR_CD
column.comment: National Destination Code (the area code of a phone number)

column.name: VOUCHER_STATUS
column.comment: Status of the voucher - The following statuses are possible: BE - ordered (the voucher was ordered from the manufacturer); ER - received (the voucher was received by VF); VT - distributed (the voucher has been sold); VE - available (The Voucher k

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For himself or others to him

column.name: DUOBILL_IND
column.comment: Indicates if - resp. what kind of - DuoBill - 0 - not Duobill; 1 - Duobill (Master); 2 - Duobill (Slave)

column.name: DUO_BILL_SERIAL_NUM
column.comment: For Kind_of_Duo_Card = 'M' (master) or 'S' (slave) , the field contains the Sim_Serial_No of the other card.

column.name: TWIN_CARD_IND
column.comment: Y/N

column.name: TECHNICAL_PROFILE_ID
column.comment: The technical profile ID of a SIM card.

column.name: MANF_PO_LOCATION_ID
column.comment: N/A

column.name: MANF_PO_ACTIVITY
column.comment: N/A

column.name: MANF_PO_OID
column.comment: N/A

column.name: SIM_PRODUCTION_DATE
column.comment: The production date of the SIM card.

column.name: PRINTED_ICC_ID
column.comment: The ICC_ID printed on the SIM card.

column.name: INCLUDE_IN_PCK_IND
column.comment: For Serial Items, this field indicates whether the serial item is a part of a package or a stand-alone. When the indicator is 'Y', the serial can not be sold as a regular item. One example is a Pre-paid package.  This field must be Y  for a prepaid card.

column.name: PACKAGE_SERIAL_NUM
column.comment: N/A

column.name: SAP_TRANSFER_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether information about this item was transferred to SAP. Valid value are Y - transferred to SAP and N - Not transferred to SAP.

column.name: FEATURE_CODE
column.comment: This field contains the feature code

column.name: SIM_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: This is the date when the SIM Card Status was set.

column.name: PACKAGE_ITEM_ID
column.comment: If the serial number is part of a package, this is the package item_id.

column.name: SP_IND
column.comment: Indicate if the item belong to a Service Provider.   Y = the item belongs to Service Provider,   N = the item does not belong to Service Provider.

column.name: PACKET_UNIT_NO
column.comment: This is the ID of the packet unit in the PPC file in which the record representing the SIM card appears.

column.name: CAP_CONFIG_TABLE
column.comment: Ein Verweis auf eine Tabelle, die die zur Produktionszeit fuer die Karte festgelegten Konfigurationsmoeglichkeiten spezifiziert.

column.name: PACKAGE_MSISDN
column.comment: The MSISDN related to the package for prepaid Sim Cards.

column.name: VO_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the sales organization

column.name: SAP_OID
column.comment: SAP odometer number Received from SAP by SIM_MOVEMENT interface

column.name: CARRIER_ID
column.comment: The Carrier Id is used identify the Telecoms Carrier.  E.g.  033 – DTAG. This specifies the VNB/SP.

column.name: CARRIER_TRACKING_NO
column.comment: The Carrier Tracking number.

column.name: SAP_LINE_NO
column.comment: SAP line number (position identifiers) with in one delivery

column.name: SIM_TYPE
column.comment: The code of the SIM type.

column.name: SENT_TO_SP_IND
column.comment: Indicate if an SSS file was created for this Sim card.  Valid values are Y and N.

column.name: ORIG_MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market_code aus KIAS. MMC= Vodafone Credit,  MMO = Vodafone Callya , PUC = Service Provider Credit, PUA = Service Provider Debit

column.name: CHIP_REFERENCE
column.comment: Identification of chip used for production of SIM-Cards.

column.name: AMF
column.comment: N/A

column.name: PROFILE_ID
column.comment: Attribute of the subscriber at the HLR.

column.name: CHNG_MRK_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the field market_code was changed.

column.name: TC_IND
column.comment: TODO - To distinguish CDRs from regular SP with VPN frm ESP CDRs.

column.name: MAF_CODE
column.comment: MAF indicator.  - To distinguish CDRs from regular SP with VPN from ESP CDRs.
